title: Tuscaloosa police captain retires after 35 years without single sick day
text:
Published By: Al.com: Tuscaloosa - Today 
Mike Flowers is retiring from the Tuscaloosa Police Department after 35 years without ever taking a sick day.file Mike Flowers, 59, le...
